executionSummary.purpose: Market Data Verification & Enrichment for Aesthetic and Dental Procedures

suspiciousGrowthRates.recommendation: These procedures require individual verification as they appear to use a default growth rate

marketDynamics.highGrowthProcedures: Stem cell and regenerative procedures show 12%+ growth
marketDynamics.matureProcedures: Botox and traditional implants at 8-9% steady growth

salesStrategy.decisionMakers: Varies by procedure - from individual practitioners to hospital committees

reimbursementTrends.covered: Medical indications for Botox, dental implants
reimbursementTrends.notCovered: Most aesthetic procedures, stem cell treatments
reimbursementTrends.emerging: Insurance coverage expanding for reconstructive applications

recommendationsForContinuousImprovement.action: Set up automated monthly verification for high-value procedures (>$1B)
recommendationsForContinuousImprovement.reason: Market dynamics change rapidly for major procedures

recommendationsForContinuousImprovement.action: Integrate real-time data feeds from market research APIs
recommendationsForContinuousImprovement.reason: Manual verification is time-consuming and may miss updates

recommendationsForContinuousImprovement.action: Create alerts for significant market changes (>15% variance)
recommendationsForContinuousImprovement.reason: Sales teams need immediate notification of market shifts

recommendationsForContinuousImprovement.action: Develop procedure-specific dashboards with drill-down capabilities
recommendationsForContinuousImprovement.reason: Sales reps need quick access to relevant market intelligence

unverifiableProcedures.note: Some highly specialized or emerging procedures lack public market data
examples: Proprietary techniques with limited market penetration
Experimental treatments in early clinical stages
unverifiableProcedures.recommendation: Flag these for manual research or industry expert consultation
